profile.summary: With over 15 years of experience in the IT industry under his belt and a focus on achieving excellence in everything he does, Matt decided he wanted to explore his creative/artistic side. He decided to take his passion for music and public speaking to the next level by making a paradigm shift to the entertainment industry in 2014 and hasn’t looked back ever since.

contact.address: House No 48/C, Colva Beach Rd, Colva, GOA 403708, India
